Happy: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy ― Anne Frank
Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy ― Roy T. Bennett
Afraid: Don't be afraid of being scared. To be afraid is a sign of common sense. Only complete idiots are not afraid of anything ― Carlos Ruiz Zafón

Beethoven said that it's better to hit the wrong note confidently, than hit the right note unconfidently. Never be afraid to be wrong or to embarrass yourself; we are all students in this life, and there is always something more to learn ― Mike Norton
Angry: There are two things a person should never be angry at, what they can help, and what they cannot ― Plato
Do not allow yourself to be blinded by fear and anger. Everything is only as it is ― Yuki Urishibara
Sad: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected ― Nicholas Sparks
I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more ― C. S. Lewis
Excited: Dear world, I am excited to be alive in you, and I am thankful for another year ― Charlotte Eriksson
Dreams keep us motivated and goals keep us going. But we gotta take action to achieve our goals, to make our dreams come true ― Abhishek Kumar
Content: To be content with little is difficult; to be content with much, impossible ― Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach
It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack ― Germany Kent
